detectors.description:
GrowToken.transferOwnership(address) (../../../Desktop/mainnet/0a/0a9A9ce600D08BF9b76F49FA4e7b38A67EBEB1E6_GrowToken.sol#113-116) should emit an event for: 
	- owner = newOwner (../../../Desktop/mainnet/0a/0a9A9ce600D08BF9b76F49FA4e7b38A67EBEB1E6_GrowToken.sol#115)

GrowToken.setPrices(uint256,uint256) (../../../Desktop/mainnet/0a/0a9A9ce600D08BF9b76F49FA4e7b38A67EBEB1E6_GrowToken.sol#118-121) should emit an event for: 
	- sellPrice = newSellPrice (../../../Desktop/mainnet/0a/0a9A9ce600D08BF9b76F49FA4e7b38A67EBEB1E6_GrowToken.sol#119)

GrowToken.transferOwnership(address).newOwner (../../../Desktop/mainnet/0a/0a9A9ce600D08BF9b76F49FA4e7b38A67EBEB1E6_GrowToken.sol#113) lacks a zero-check on :
		- owner = newOwner (../../../Desktop/mainnet/0a/0a9A9ce600D08BF9b76F49FA4e7b38A67EBEB1E6_GrowToken.sol#115)
solc-0.4.18 is not recommended for deployment
